net.markenwerk.commons.datastructures

Class Optional<Payload>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.markenwerk.commons.datastructures.Optional<Payload>
  • Type Parameters:
    Payload - The payload type.

    public final class Optional<Payload>
extends Object
    An Optional is a simple immutable container class that may holds a single value.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Torsten Krause (tk at markenwerk dot net)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Optional()
      Creates a new Optional without a value.
      Optional(Payload value)
      Creates a new Optional.
      Optional(Payload value, boolean ignoreNull)
      Creates a new Optional.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <Result> Optional<Result> convert(Converter<? super Payload,? extends Result> converter)
      Converts the payload value of this Optional, if present, and returns another Optional.
      boolean equals(Object object) 
      Payload getValue()
      Returns the value this Optional has been created with, if any.
      Payload getValue(Payload fallback)
      Returns the value this Optional has been created with, if any, or the given fallback payload value.
      Payload getValue(Provider<? extends Payload> provider)
      Returns the value this Optional has been created with, if any, or a payload value provided by the given Provider.

      boolean hasValue()
      Returns whether this Optional has a value.

      • hasValue

        Returns whether this Optional has a value.

      • getValue

        public Payload getValue()
                 throws NoSuchElementException
        Returns the value this Optional has been created with, if any.
        Returns:
        The value.
        Throws:
        NoSuchElementException - If this Optional has no value.

      • getValue

        public Payload getValue(Payload fallback)
        Returns the value this Optional has been created with, if any, or the given fallback payload value.
        Parameters:
        fallback - The fallback payload value to be used.
        Returns:
        The value.

      • getValue

        public Payload getValue(Provider<? extends Payload> provider)
                 throws IllegalArgumentException,
                        ProvisioningException
        Returns the value this Optional has been created with, if any, or a payload value provided by the given Provider.
        Parameters:
        provider - The Provider to be used.
        Returns:
        The value.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the given Provider is null.
        ProvisioningException - If the given Provider failed to provide a fallback payload value.

      • convert

        public <Result> Optional<Result> convert(Converter<? super Payload,? extends Result> converter)
                                  throws IllegalArgumentException
        Converts the payload value of this Optional, if present, and returns another Optional.
        Type Parameters:
        Result - The result type.
        Parameters:
        converter - The Converter to be used.
        Returns:
        The result value returned by the given OptionalSelection.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the given Converter is null.

      • select

                       throws IllegalArgumentException
        Calls the appropriate method on the given OptionalSelection.
        Type Parameters:
        Result - The result type.
        Parameters:
        selection - The OptionalSelection to be used.
        Returns:
        The result value returned by the given OptionalSelection.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the given OptionalSelection is null.
